short_summary: Construction of Parks Canada Office & Visitor Centre building, Staff Housing Duplex, and Residential Renovations in Tulita.
description: The work involves the construction of Parks Canada Office & Visitor Centre building, Staff Housing Duplex, and Residential Renovations in Tulita, Northwest Territories.
tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Notice Title:** Invitation to Qualify - Phase 1 - Tulita Visitor Centre and Staff Housing

**Contracting Entity:** PSPC (Department of Public Works and Government Services)

**Reference Number:** WS3985532230-Doc3987390229
**Solicitation Number:** WS3985532230
**Publication Date:** May 11, 2023

**Tender Details:**

* Tender Closing Date: June 12, 2023, 2:00 p.m. (EDT)
* Recognition of Trade Agreements: 
  + Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  + Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  + Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  + Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
  + World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  + Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
  + Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
  + Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
  + Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Requested Services: Residential building construction services and Specialized public building construction services

**End User:** Parks Canada Agency (PC)
**Contract End Date:** September 18, 2026

**Notice Information:**

* Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16248292?extsite=MTYyNDgyOTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
* Contact Information:
  + Eric Kwan (SPAC/PSPC)
  + Email: eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Important:**

- The qualification list will expire within 180 days or upon award of a contract in Phase Two, whichever is earlier.
- The prequalification list will not be used in any other solicitation. 

### How to Qualify

Bidders must provide the required information, including a technical, Indigenous Participation Plan, and financial bid, in response to the tender. The evaluation will be based on the Lowest Price. Tide notes will not be automatically reproduced in either a solicitation or another, any separate tender procurement, and estimations of experience in comparable construction projects will not repeatedly effect stage to stage. [Colour codes rebanted tous].
